text: Good morning Dear! Thank you Honey for teaching me what is extra in a marriage and for being an example to me! I will still fall short of being perfect but I know that Jesus is helping me to love you and Him more and more! With Jesus, we have victory! ðŸ’• Honey, I'm sorry when I don't love you perfectly. I hate it when I don't love you perfectly but Jesus is showing me how to love you more!
